page.title: 10HOUSING IN DRUIDS HEATH
page.content: The {high rise flats} in which I live are called Pleck House which is in Winterborne Croft in DruidÂ£s Heath opposite Walkers Heath Park.There are twelve floors and I live on the fifth. From my kitchen window I can see Walkers Heath Park and the fields which belong to Moundsley and Crabmill Farms.From the balcony I can see the Druids Heath housing estate of {modern terraces and maisonettes}.We donÂ£t have milk delivered to our flat because the milkman doesnÂ£t leave any. It can be very noisy living here because of people around us. Our under floor heating is very good in Winter and in Summer we can use the electric fire if necessary.The lift only goes up to the 11th.floor this is because the mechanism is on the 12th. floor. It usually breaks down due vand- alism.By Anna Coalter,Bells Farm J/I.
